email_chain.subject: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

We are looking to charter a vessel for an iron ore shipment from Tubarao to Qingdao. Cargo size is approximately 180,000 MT. Could you provide a freight rate and vessel availability for a laycan around October 10-15?

Best regards,
Alex Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thanks for your inquiry. We have the MV OCEAN GLORY available, DWT 210,000, LOA 330m. Freight rate is $22/MT CFR. Laycan can be adjusted to October 12-17. Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Sarah Connor

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Sarah,

The laycan works, but the freight rate seems high compared to current market levels. Can you offer a better rate, say $19/MT? Also, what is the demurrage rate?

Best,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Alex,

I can bring the rate down to $20/MT, but that's the best I can do. Demurrage is $25,000/day pro rata. Let me know if this is acceptable.

Best,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Sarah,

$20/MT works for us. Please confirm the laycan as October 12-17 and send over the contract details.

Best,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Alex,

Confirmed. Laycan is October 12-17. I will send the contract details shortly.

Best,
Sarah
